Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Protein - truncation testing of the entire ATM cDNA detected 92 ( 66 % ) truncating mutations in 140 mutant alleles screened .

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| 66 % |
| truncating mutations |

The paragraph does not mention any specific disease, but rather discusses the results of a test that detected truncating mutations in the ATM gene. Therefore, the valid entities that can be extracted are:

* 66 % (which refers to the percentage of truncating mutations detected)
* truncating mutations (which refers to the type of mutation detected)

Note that "ATM" is not a disease, but rather a gene that was tested for mutations.
